publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1897 Ms Sandra White: First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign—That the Parliament notes the poster campaign by First ScotRail and the British Transport Police highlighting the physical and verbal abuse that many rail workers face in the course of their working lives; believes that nobody should have to endure the threat of violence at work and that drawing attention to this problem and educating people about the consequences of their actions is a positive step, and congratulates First Scotrail and the British Transport Police for taking the first step towards tackling this serious problem.
S2M-1897 First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign (lodged on 26 October 2004) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1897 Ms Sandra White: First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign—That the Parliament notes the poster campaign by First ScotRail and the British Transport Police highlighting the physical and verbal abuse that many rail workers face in the course of their working lives; believes that nobody should have to endure the threat of violence at work and that drawing attention to this problem and educating people about the consequences of their actions is a positive step, and congratulates First Scotrail and the British Transport Police for taking the first step towards tackling this serious problem. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1897 First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign (lodged on 26 October 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1897 First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign (lodged on 26 October 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1897 First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign (lodged on 26 October 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1897 First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign (lodged on 26 October 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
